languages.text: "Посмотрим, как ты справишься с теми, что я уже возложил на тебя. Помни — Иремерисс моя, когда бы и где бы мы не встретили ее. На этом — мой разговор к тебе исчерпан, {name}".
"Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Посмотрим, как ты справишься с теми, что я уже возложил на тебя. Помни — Иремерисс моя, когда бы и где бы мы не встретили ее. На этом — мой разговор к тебе исчерпан, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “咱们来看看你会如何完成我交给你的任务吧。记住，无论什么时候遇到伊芮梅莉斯，她都是我的猎物。除此之外，我没什么话要对你说了，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “咱们来看看你会如何完成我交给你的任务吧。记住，无论什么时候遇到伊芮梅莉斯，她都是我的猎物。除此之外，我没什么话要对你说了，{name}。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「さて、お前が与えられた任務をどう料理するか、見ものだな。忘れるなよ。いつどこで奴に遭遇しても、イレメリスは俺がいただく。それでいいなら、もう言うことはないぜ、{name}」
languages.original_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、お前が与えられた任務をどう料理するか、見ものだな。忘れるなよ。いつどこで奴に遭遇しても、イレメリスは俺がいただく。それでいいなら、もう言うことはないぜ、{name}」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Veamos cómo te desenvuelves con las tareas que ya te he encomendado. Recuerda: Yremeryss es mía, cuando y donde la encontremos. Aparte de eso, no tengo nada más que decirte, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Veamos cómo te desenvuelves con las tareas que ya te he encomendado. Recuerda: Yremeryss es mía, cuando y donde la encontremos. Aparte de eso, no tengo nada más que decirte, {name}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Voyons comment vous vous débrouillez avec les tâches que je vous ai déjà confiées. N'oubliez pas : quelles que soient les circonstances de notre rencontre, Yremeryss est à moi. Sur ce, je n'ai plus rien à vous dire, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Voyons comment vous vous débrouillez avec les tâches que je vous ai déjà confiées. N'oubliez pas : quelles que soient les circonstances de notre rencontre, Yremeryss est à moi. Sur ce, je n'ai plus rien à vous dire, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sehen wir erst mal, wie Ihr die Aufgaben bewältigt, die ich Euch bereits aufgetragen habe. Denkt daran, Yremeryss gehört mir, wann und wo wir ihr auch begegnen mögen. Mehr habe ich Euch nicht zu sagen, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Sehen wir erst mal, wie Ihr die Aufgaben bewältigt, die ich Euch bereits aufgetragen habe. Denkt daran, Yremeryss gehört mir, wann und wo wir ihr auch begegnen mögen. Mehr habe ich Euch nicht zu sagen, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, ."

languages.text: "Sana vermiş olduğum görevlerle nasıl başa çıkacağını görelim. Nerede ve ne zaman karşılaşırsak karşılaşalım unutma ki Yremeryss benimdir. Sana bundan başka söyleyecek bir şeyim yok {name}."
languages.original_text: "Let us see how you handle the tasks I have already given you. Remember — Yremeryss is mine, whenever and wherever we encounter her. With that, I have nothing more to say to you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Sana vermiş olduğum görevlerle nasıl başa çıkacağını görelim. Nerede ve ne zaman karşılaşırsak karşılaşalım unutma ki Yremeryss benimdir. Sana bundan başka söyleyecek bir şeyim yok {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
